feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: AKS Backup and Recovery
entry.summary: Learn how to back up and recover your AKS clusters and their workloads.

entry.title: IBM z/OS online transaction processing on Azure
entry.summary: Migrate a z/OS online transaction processing (OLTP) workload to an Azure application that is cost-effective, responsive, scalable, and adaptable.

entry.title: Mainframe and midrange data replication to Azure using Qlik
entry.summary: See how Qlik Replication is a valuable tool for migrating mainframe and midrange systems to the cloud, or for extending such systems with cloud applications.

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Deploy this scenario
entry.summary: Fifth article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: Use Azure Batch to run Financial Service Industry (FSI) workloads
entry.summary: Learn how to run FSI workloads on Azure using Azure Batch.

entry.title: Deploy Quantum ESPRESSO on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Find out how Quantum ESPRESSO materials modeling software performs on an Azure virtual machine.

entry.title: Mainframe workload migration proof of concept
entry.summary: Learn about guidance for creating a proof of concept, which helps you migrate a workload from a mainframe to the cloud.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.title: Deploy M-Star on a virtual machine
entry.summary: Learn how M-Star computational fluid dynamics software performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM). Learn the steps for running M-Star on an Azure VM.

entry.title: Software-defined vehicle DevOps toolchain
entry.summary: Learn about an architecture for transitioning to SDVs in which the in-vehicle software stack undergoes simulation and testing in cloud-based environments.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for control planes in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: Learn about approaches to designing and creating control planes for your multitenant solutions, including manual, low-code, and custom approaches.

entry.title: Deploy CP2K on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Find out how CP2K quantum chemistry and solid-state physics software performs on an Azure virtual machine.

entry.title: Deploy NAMD on a virtual machine
entry.summary: Learn how NAMD, a parallel molecular dynamics application designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems, performs on an Azure VM.

entry.title: Deploy WRF on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Find out how WRF performs on an Azure virtual machine and get a brief description of the steps for running the software on Azure.

entry.title: Continuous validation with Azure Load Testing and Azure Chaos Studio
entry.summary: Guide on performing automated continuous validation in production-like environments with Azure Load Testing and Chaos Studio.

entry.title: Deploy GROMACS on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Find out how GROMACS molecular dynamics simulation software performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

entry.title: AKS triage—Cluster health
entry.summary: Learn how to check the overall health of an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster, as part of a triage step for AKS clusters.

entry.title: AKS triage—Container registry connectivity
entry.summary: Learn about verifying the connection to a container registry. This step is part of the triage practice for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters.

entry.title: AKS triage—Admission controllers
entry.summary: Learn how to verify that the admission controllers are working as expected. This step is part of the triage practices for AKS clusters.

entry.title: AKS triage—Workload deployments
entry.summary: Learn how to check whether workload deployments and DaemonSet features are running properly. This step is part of the triage practices for an AKS cluster.

entry.title: AKS triage—Node health
entry.summary: Learn about the triage step in which you examine the health of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and pods and resolve issues.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) operations triage
entry.summary: Learn about the five articles that describe the triage practices for AKS operations. Get an overview of the top-down triage approach.

entry.title: Deploy Autodesk Maya on a virtual machine
entry.summary: See how Autodesk Maya performs on an Azure virtual machine. Maya provides 3D animation, modeling, simulation, and rendering capabilities.

entry.title: The journey to SaaS: Dynamics 365
entry.summary: Learn from a first-hand account about the journey and decisions that made Microsoft Dynamics 365 a successful SaaS product.

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Bicep modules design considerations
entry.summary: Design considerations for the Azure landing zones Bicep modules.

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Terraform module design considerations
entry.summary: Design considerations for the Azure landing zones Terraform module.

entry.title: The journey to SaaS: Dynamics 365
entry.summary: Learn from a first-hand account about the journey and decisions that made Microsoft Dynamics 365 a successful SaaS product.

entry.title: Real-time analytics on data with Azure Service Bus and Azure Data Explorer
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Service Bus and Azure Data Explorer to enhance an existing message broker architecture with near real-time analytics.

entry.title: Virtualization of a Unisys ClearPath Forward OS 2200 enterprise server on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use virtualization technologies from Microsoft partner Unisys with an existing Unisys ClearPath Forward (CPF) Dorado enterprise server.

entry.title: Deploy OpenRadioss on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Find out how OpenRadioss finite element analysis (FEA) software performs on an Azure virtual machine.

entry.title: Windows 365 Azure network connection
entry.summary: Learn how Windows 365 delivers highly optimized and personalized computing instances that are purpose built for each user's requirements.

entry.title: Automotive connected fleets
entry.summary: Learn how the connected fleets reference architecture helps you build solutions to manage connected fleets, generate insights, and integrate fleet solutions.

entry.title: Microsoft SaaS stories
entry.summary: Collection of insightful interviews featuring Microsoft partners who have embarked on their unique software as a service (SaaS) journey.

entry.title: SWIFT Alliance Connect Virtual on Azure
entry.summary: Learn about SWIFT Alliance Connect Virtual components that can be deployed on Azure.

entry.title: Ingest FAA SWIM content to analyze flight data
entry.summary: Learn how to integrate Chef Infra, Chef InSpec, Test Kitchen, Terraform, Terraform Cloud, and GitHub Actions to automate and create data analytics environments.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra security for AWS
entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Azure VMware Solution networking
entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block networking. Understand what networking solution options exist and how to choose between them.

entry.title: Extend mainframes to digital channels by using standards-based REST APIs
entry.summary: Learn how the digital transformation architecture extends mainframe applications to Azure without disruptions or modifications to the existing applications.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure OpenAI
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy the Azure OpenAI models and work with the features associated with each model when you have a multitenant system.

entry.title: Analyze call center recordings using text analytics for health and Azure OpenAI Service
entry.summary: Automate the transcription of healthcare-specific audio data and the process of serving that data to end users.

entry.title: Hybrid Cross-Cluster Scaling with Azure Arc for the workloads deployed on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Perform cross-cluster scaling of on-premises workloads by using Azure Arc, Traffic Manager, or Front Door and then deploy by using Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps baseline architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy Azure Spring Apps instances in multiple zones for increased availability, resilience, and performance.

entry.title: Integrate on-premises AD domains with Microsoft Entra ID
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a secure hybrid network architecture that integrates on-premises Active Directory domains with Microsoft Entra ID.

entry.title: Kubernetes monitoring and logging
entry.summary: Understand monitoring and logging for an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster and workloads, and compare Amazon EKS and AKS monitoring and logging.
